name: Cure
effect:
:instant: Remove any effect or :paralysis: from the selected [unit](../units/index.md), and remove from this [unit](../units/index.md) up to:

:empower: 0 ➣ 1 :damage:
:empower: 1 ➣ 2 :damage:
:empower: 2 ➣ 3 :damage:

— OR —

:instant: +1 :empower:
notes: [^1] It is uncertain what it meant by "effect" here.
[^2] Cure can only be cast on a friendly unit.
[^2] The removal of an effect is optional. A positive effect does not have to be removed and may therefore remain active.
